BasicInfo.short: SalesPredict helps sales, marketing, and customer success professionals improve conversions through predictive analytics and big data.

Products.name: SalesPredict Predictive Marketing
Products.description: Predictive lead scoring and data insights to help marketers target and segment effectively and deliver more sales-qualified leads.

Products.name: SalesPredict Predictive Customer Success
Products.description: Predictive account scoring and insights to help customer success teams increase customer retention & recurring revenue by preventing churn.

Products.name: SalesPredict Predictive Sales
Products.description: Predictive lead and account scoring + data insights to help sales target outbound efforts & convert more leads to closed sales more quickly.
